statements: SELECT * FROM festival_schedule;
SELECT performer_name, showtime FROM festival_schedule;
SELECT performer_id, showtime, performer_name FROM festival_schedule;
SELECT * FROM festival_schedule WHERE performer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM festival_schedule ORDER BY showtime DESC;
SELECT performer_name, showtime FROM festival_schedule WHERE performer_id = 1 ORDER BY showtime DESC;
SELECT * FROM festival_schedule WHERE performer_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY performer_name ASC, showtime ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT performer_name FROM festival_schedule WHERE showtime < NOW() ORDER BY performer_name;
SELECT performer_name, COUNT(*) AS performances_count FROM festival_schedule GROUP BY performer_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY performances_count DESC;

SELECT performer_name, DATE(showtime) AS show_date, COUNT(*) AS show_count FROM festival_schedule WHERE showtime BETWEEN '2022-11-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-11-30 23:59:59' GROUP BY performer_name, show_date ORDER BY show_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM performer_lineup;
SELECT performer_name, performance_date FROM performer_lineup ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT performer_name FROM performer_lineup WHERE performer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM showtimes ORDER BY showtime ASC;
SELECT performer_name, showtime FROM performer_lineup JOIN showtimes ON performer_lineup.performer_id = showtimes.performer_id ORDER BY showtime DESC;
SELECT * FROM performer_lineup WHERE performer_id = 1;
SELECT performer_name, performance_date FROM performer_lineup WHERE performance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT performer_name, showtime FROM performer_lineup INNER JOIN showtimes ON performer_lineup.performer_id = showtimes.performer_id;
SELECT * FROM performer_lineup ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT performer_name FROM performer_lineup;
SELECT * FROM Performers;
SELECT performer_name, performer_type FROM Performers ORDER BY performer_name DESC;
SELECT show_name, show_date FROM Shows WHERE show_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ShowLineup WHERE lineup_order < 3 ORDER BY lineup_order ASC;
SELECT performer_name, performance_fee FROM Performers WHERE performer_type = 'Singer';
SELECT * FROM Performers;
SELECT performer_name, performer_type FROM Performers WHERE performer_type = 'Singer';
SELECT show_name, show_date FROM Shows WHERE show_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT performer_name, show_name FROM Performers JOIN ShowLineup ON Performers.performer_id = ShowLineup.performer_id JOIN Shows ON ShowLineup.show_id = Shows.show_id;
SELECT performer_name, performance_fee FROM Performers WHERE performance_fee > 500.00 ORDER BY performance_fee DESC;
SELECT * FROM performer;
SELECT id, name, age FROM performer ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, comedy_style FROM performer WHERE age > 30;
SELECT showtime.show_date, showtime.start_time, location FROM showtime INNER JOIN schedule ON showtime.id = schedule.showtime_id;
SELECT performer.name, showtime.show_date, ticket.price FROM performer INNER JOIN schedule ON performer.id = schedule.performer_id INNER JOIN ticket ON schedule.id = ticket.schedule_id;
SELECT * FROM performer WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT show_date, start_time, end_time FROM showtime WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY show_date ASC;

SELECT performer.name, showtime.location FROM performer JOIN schedule ON performer.id = schedule.performer_id JOIN showtime ON schedule.showtime_id = showtime.id WHERE performer.comedy_style = 'Stand-up';
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_tickets FROM ticket WHERE price > 50;
SELECT MIN(start_time), MAX(end_time) FROM showtime GROUP BY location ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM Performers;
SELECT performer_name, performer_genre FROM Performers;
SELECT show_name, show_date, show_time FROM Shows;
SELECT venue_name, venue_location FROM Venues;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_price, ticket_quantity FROM Tickets;
SELECT * FROM Performers;
SELECT performer_name, performer_genre FROM Performers WHERE performer_genre='Pop';
SELECT show_name, show_date, show_time FROM Shows ORDER BY show_date DESC, show_time ASC;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_price, ticket_quantity FROM Tickets WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT venue_name, venue_location FROM Venues WHERE venue_location LIKE '%City' ORDER BY venue_name;
